sfField.formula: ccrz__ShipAmount__c + ccrz__SubtotalAmount__c + ccrz__TaxAmount__c + ccrz__AdjustmentAmount__c + ccrz__ShipDiscountAmount__c + ccrz__TotalSurcharge__c

IF( ccrz__Storefront__c = 'CREStore', '43', 
 IF( ccrz__Storefront__c = 'CPS', '45', 
 IF( ccrz__Storefront__c = 'GeneralStore', 
 IF( NSSCCConnector_from_SFCC__c=TRUE, '46', 
 IF( Opportunity_Order__r.Override_Channel__c = false, '42', 
 IF( Opportunity_Order__r.Override_Channel__c = true, '47', 
 IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity_Order__c)),Opportunity_Order__r.RecordType.Name != 'Sales Opportunity',Opportunity_Order__r.RecordType.Name != 'Order Opportunity'), '48', 
'46') ) ) ), '') ) )
